codeclient.config.api.description: Allows external apps to add code to your plot.
codeclient.config.read_charset.descripti: Can fix artifacts in ActionDump loading.
codeclient.config.save_charset.descripti: When getting the actiondump get it in a needed format.
codeclient.config.dev_for_build.descript: Uses dev mode instead of build mode, clearing your inventory and teleporting you.
codeclient.config.auto_focus_search.desc: When opening the Code Palette (%s) automatically select the search bar.
This is disabled because it interferes with navigation binds.
codeclient.config.chat_edits_vars.descri: Opening chat whilst holding a value will automatically put the contents in chat.
codeclient.config.ccdbug.description: Toggle CCDBUG, which is a variable and entity watcher for debugging.
codeclient.config.insert_overlay.descrip: Click on an empty slot in a code chest to insert a value.
codeclient.config.param_ghosts.descripti: See and be able to hover parameter information in chest slots.
codeclient.config.category.action_viewer: Display a tooltip that shows the code block's description.
codeclient.config.action_viewer.descript: Pin code block description to the inventory while inside code chests.
codeclient.config.invert_action_viewer_s: Invert the direction the action tooltip scrolls inside code chests.
codeclient.config.action_viewer_alignmen: Change where the tooltip displays inside code chests.
codeclient.config.command.query.fail: There is no option with name %s.
codeclient.config.command.fail: You cannot set this config option.
codeclient.parse_db: Could not parse ActionDump. Go to %s to find out how to fix this.
codeclient.phaser.plot_origin: CodeClient doesn't know the plot origin.
codeclient.phaser.dev_mode1: You cannot use phaser in build mode since %s to teleport.
Couldn't start. Check that you are on node beta.
There is a chance beta is broken and doesn't serve the Action Dump right now.
codeclient.action.get_action_dump.scanni: There will now be a file in your Minecraft directory
It will instead be printed in the console.
codeclient.action.confirmcc.use: Type /confirmcc to confirm this destructive action.
codeclient.warning.dev_mode: You must be in dev mode!
codeclient.warning.creative_mode: You must be in creative mode!
codeclient.search.hover.teleport:
Click to teleport
x: %s, y: %s, z: %s
codeclient.files.hold_template: You need to hold a template to save.
codeclient.files.empty_dir: Please use an empty folder to save into.
codeclient.files.error.cant_delete: Couldn't delete the file or folder
codeclient.files.error.not_found: Couldn't find file or folder there.
codeclient.files.git: This is a git tracked directory
codeclient.files.open_native: Click to open it in file explorer.
codeclient.files.not_in_templates: That is not in the templates directory.
codeclient.api.scope.prompt: The connected application has requested the following permissions:
codeclient.api.scope.type.read_plot: Scan plot code & get plot size
codeclient.api.scope.type.movement: Teleport to plot spawn & switch modes
codeclient.api.scope.type.clear_plot: Clear the entirety of your plot's codespace
codeclient.api.danger.default.descriptio: Assigned by default to all applications.
codeclient.api.danger.dangerous.descript: Very risky; accept with extreme caution.
codeclient.api.authorised: The connected application is now authorized with the requested permissions.
codeclient.api.remove: You can remove the app by running /auth remove.
codeclient.api.removed: Removed extra permissions from the connected app.
codeclient.api.disconnected: The connected app can no longer interact with CodeClient.
codeclient.api.scope.invalid: The connected app requested an invalid permission.
